item.title: Announcing Kafka-on-Pulsar: bring native Kafka protocol support to Apache Pulsar
item.description: This is a repost from OVHcloud’s official blogpost., please read it there to support my company. Thanks Horacio Gonzalez for the awesome drawings! This post has been published on both the StreamNative and OVHcloud blogs and was co-authored by Sijie Guo, Jia Zhai and Pierre Zemb. Thanks Horacio Gonzalez for the illustrations! We are excited to announce that StreamNative and OVHcloud are open-sourcing “Kafka on Pulsar” (KoP). KoP brings the native Apache Kafka protocol support to Apache Pulsar by introducing a Kafka protocol handler on Pulsar brokers.
